item.description:
Central Mass Hypnosis and NLP Group is having another marvelous meetup.  if you ahve not been to one of Chris's meetups, you need to go.  What a topic.  We all want to attract things (and charisma never hurts).

Increasing Magnetism and Charisma for Yourself and How Others Respond 

Wednesday, February 15, 2012, 6:15 PM

Marlborough Public Library

35 West Main Street, Marlborough, MA 

Downstairs in the Story Hour room. Best to park in the back of the library.

Price: $5.00/per person


CREATING MAGNETISM AND CHARISMA

FOR YOURSELF AND OTHERS

 

This meetup will be experiential as we use hypnosis and nlp to increase Charisma and personal magnetism.  It will help you feel more appreciative about who you are, feel more deserving and worthy of self-love.  Than we will increase magnetism to attract qualities you want and than use it to influence others around you. 

This is a perfect exercise in hypnosis and nlp to foster qualities in yourself and influence others.  Sound like elements of Law of Attraction???  Well it certainly does incorporate those!

Come on out and give yourself a lift, boost and charge to your Magnetic Charisma!
item.how_to_find_us: Downstairs in the Story Hour room. Best to park in the back of the library.

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: Increasing Magnetism and Charisma for Yourself and How Others Respond
